attributes.action: Hold a referendum on wether to revoke Article 50, or to leave on a no deal basis
attributes.additional_details:
Too much time has and is being wasted, too much of the tax payers money has been used, and yet we have gotten nowhere. The people were lied to about what would happen with the first referendum, the House’s of Parliament can vote multiple times even for the same deal, so why can’t the people? Allow the people to vote to revoke Article 50 and remain, or to leave with no deal.
Let our voices be heard.
Let us decide once and for all.

There are other problems in the UK that need the time and money.
attributes.background:
Hold another referendum on wether to revoke Article 50, or to leave the EU on a no-deal basis.
The government cannot decide, so allow the people too. This has gone on too long. Give the people another voice.
